msbt.message: Brace yourself, 'cause I have big news. Yours truly located and is now in possession ofwait for it The Bunny Day crown recipe!Jealous? Don't worry, I got you covered. I made a copy of it just for you.
I wonder what other recipes are out there, lurking in the shadows, just waiting to be discovered. This is just the type of intrigue that my soon-to-be-written autobiography has been missing!
Oh wait. I think your pockets are full. Why don't I hold on to this recipe until you have a place to put it. I'd hate to misplace something so valuable.

Wanna hear something amazing?<10_4 /> I found the Bunny Day bag recipe!Actually, now that I think about it, it's totally believable that I would have found something so awesome. Of course, I thought of you almost right after I finished congratulating myself for discovering it. Here, I made a copy for you!
Not only will this bag be useful, it's a total fashion statement.What are you waiting for? Gather some eggs and make it already, !
Hold up. I don't think you have space for this.Don't worry. I'll hang on to the recipe until you've made some room.
